overview: These naughty school girl sluts are up to more mischief at the Young Harlots Academy! Keeping up their grades are always at the top of their priority and they will do anything to be the best whore they can be! So watch as these filthy delinquents raise their skirts; spread those cheeks and get fucked in every way possible! This is one school you'll wish you'd attended!
title: Young Harlots: School Report
